name: Commeasure Pte Ltd
description: Operator of an online hotel management and booking platform intended to offer affordable accommodations for travelers. The company offers properties with standardized amenities including free wifi, clean spotless rooms, comfy beds, TV, and daily mineral water, and lets hotel managers grow their business and increase revenues while streamlining their operations, enabling customers to get reliable stays in all major cities and destinations and also stay partners, by letting them improve their business revenue models.
one_liner: Operator of an online hotel management and booking platform intended to offer affordable accommodations for travelers. The company offers properties with standardized amenities including free wifi, clean spotless rooms, comfy beds, TV, and daily mineral water, and lets hotel managers grow their business and increase revenues while streamlining their operations, enabling customers to get reliable stays in all major cities and destinations and also stay partners, by letting them improve their business revenue models.
